alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:21PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Franklin, southeastern Crawford and northeastern Sebastian Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 519 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Dyer, and another strong storm 5 miles north of Cecil, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Charleston... Alma... Barling... Lavaca... Mulberry... Dyer... Branch... Rudy... Kibler... Concord... Shibley... Toney... Peter Pender... Vesta... Cecil... Lonelm... Ursula... Cravens... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 8 and 32. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
